thread.title: Uneecops Technologies gets recognized as SAP Business One ''Partner of the Year'' consecutively for the last 3 years - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
thread.title_full: Uneecops Technologies gets recognized as SAP Business One ''Partner of the Year'' consecutively for the last 3 years - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Uneecops Technologies gets recognized as SAP Business One ''Partner of the Year'' consecutively for the last 3 years - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
text:
Outstanding contribution as an SAP partner for Business One Solution
New Delhi (PRWEB UK) 17 August 2015
For their outstanding contribution as an SAP partner for Business One Solution, New Delhi based Uneecops Technologies today announced that it has received SAP Partner Awards as a recognition for its remarkable works done in Business One Solution category during the previous year.
The SAP Partner Awards are a mark of recognition to the entire SAP Partners community and their role in taking technology solutions into the local markets. These awards are accreditation to the SAP Partners for their relentless efforts in helping enterprises, organizations and customers accomplish their business goals and achieve success with the use of range of SAP Solutions.
The selected SAP Partners were recognised out of almost 135 partners and conferred with these awards during the SAP Partner Summit held in New Delhi on August 13, 2015. The SAP Partner awards are presented annually to the top SAP partners that have excelled in developing and strengthening their alliance with SAP to drive customer success.
These awards are actually presented to partners in different categories based on field recommendations, customer feedback and various other performance indicators.
“We are extremely delighted to have been recognized by SAP. This honour is an assurance of our growing presence in the market, thereby facilitating growth and expansion in the segment,” said Mr. Ketan Jain, Assistant Director, Uneecops Technologies.
“We consider that our customers’ success is our success. We have mainly designed our strategy to excel on deliveries making our client’s businesses future ready,” added Mr. Jain. Further, “This recognition puts us on the front-runner in the category, thereby facilitating growth and expansion for us ahead. We would like to thank SAP for their ongoing trust, support, training and guidance extended to us during the years we have grown leaps and bounds,” said Mr. Jain.
About Uneecops Technologies
Uneecops is an innovative IT solutions and consulting company providing value added professional services and solutions. Uneecops currently serves over 1,000 satisfied customers across India, South East Asia, Africa and the U.S.
